bibl.title: From Gaza to Pelusium. Materials for the Historical Geography of North Sinai and Southwestern Palestine (332 BCE - 640 CE). (Beer-Sheva. Studies by the Department of Bible and Ancient Near East.)
bibl.publisher: Ben-Gurion University of the Negev Press
bibl.note: Introduction. - Part One. Historic Developments - A Comprehensive View: 1. Roads and Canals; - 2. The Written Evidence on the Settlements; - 3. Ethnical, Territorial and Economic Aspects; - 4. Military and Political Developments; - 5. Religious and Cultural Aspects. - Part Two. Gazetteer. - Part Three. Selected Texts [pp. 310-315: Papyri]. References and Abbreviations. Indexes.

FIGUERAS Pau, From Gaza to Pelusium. Materials for the Historical Geography of North Sinai and Southwestern Palestine (332 BCE - 640 CE). (Beer-Sheva. Studies by the Department of Bible and Ancient Near East.)
Beer-Sheva, Ben-Gurion University of the Negev Press, 2000, 8°, xiii-378 pp., 32 figg.
